Roadmap 2016

05 January 2016 on blog

This is mostly a wishlist, but if everything goes as planned, here is the proposed roadmap by release date.

January

  1. CMS project: Setup publishing platform/blog (54chi.github.io)
  2. HTML5 project: CSS comics (54chi.github.io/comics)
  3. DevOps project: Platform as a Service cloud service to support future projects
  4. Investments research: Automated trading tools
  5. Trip: South America

February

  1. NodeJS project: Automated podcast generation with media scrapping capabilities
  2. PM research: AgilePM, LeSS, DAD, SAFe
  3. Architecture research: High scalability architectures
  4. Programming Language research: Phoenix+Elixir, Sails.js, Kraken.js,
  5. Trip: South America (cont.)

March

  1. Investments project: Automated investment strategy algorithm
  2. Architecture research: enterprise communication tools (e.g. slackr)
  3. Programming Language research: Graph databases (Neo4J, Titan)
  4. Architecture research: payment gateways (Paypal, Stripe)
  5. Trip: SE Asia Costa Rica

April

  1. Architecture research: enterprise web components (polymer)
  2. NodeJS project Elixir project: Agile Enterprise tool
  3. Programming Language research: real time web services (rethinkDB)
  4. Trip: Australia

May

  1. Catch up on delays
  2. Trip: Australia

June

  1. Elixir project: Graph CRM
  2. Governance research: Government as a platform
  3. AI research: Artificial Intelligence concepts update, rules engine
  4. Trip: South America

July

  1. Elixir project: Enterprise collaboration tool
  2. Architecture research: SEO and analytics update
  3. Trip: North America

August

  1. IoT project: RFID for tips
  2. Elixir project: Graph E-commerce platform
  3. Trip: North America

September

  1. React project: Trading card game
  2. Architecture research: port web applications to mobile markets

October

  1. PO research: Business models for manufacturing
  2. PO research: Supply chain and logistics
  3. Trip: TBD

November

  1. Elixir project: Idea to Market
  2. Catch up
    1. Trip: TBD

December

  1. Elixir project: Supply chain
  2. Trip: SE Asia

Updates 03/19/2016: SE Asia trip was postponed till the end of the year and went to Costa Rica instead. Future preference for Elixir vs Node (functional programming is a good thing to know!)

54chi
